ComicInfo.Summary: The 1981 slasher classic comes to comics with brand-new bloody stories for the first time! Love isn't the only thing flowing, as the town of Valentine Bluffs invites you back for another bloody good time! It's the cult-classic slasher smash hit straight from the 1980's - My Bloody Valentine! Just when you thought it was safe to go back in the mines! Harry Warden turned Valentine's Day into one town's personal nightmare with a hand on his pick axe and a heart full of revenge. Now, the terror has returned, and the body count is rising! There's more than one way to lose your heart! Roses are Red - Don't End Up Dead - this February!
